EnhancedContent: We’ve enhanced the GPT-4.1 Copilot code completion model in GitHub Copilot to improve the model’s ability to infer your intent from code context. As a result, you’ll see more accurate and contextually relevant inline code suggestions. This update is available for all users on all plans.
Title: GPT-4.1 Copilot code completion model — October update
Description:
